body_html:
The tpu_estimator is broken due to the fact you are using public API.

I think reducing the log frequency is better. Can you convert your change to that? With that being said, I think you need to update _StopAfterNEvalsHook and skip some logging steps (but remain the final one)

Thanks.
body_text:
The tpu_estimator is broken due to the fact you are using public API.
I think reducing the log frequency is better. Can you convert your change to that? With that being said, I think you need to update _StopAfterNEvalsHook and skip some logging steps (but remain the final one)
Thanks.
body:
The tpu_estimator is broken due to the fact you are using public API.

I think reducing the log frequency is better. Can you convert your change to that? With that being said, I think you need to update _StopAfterNEvalsHook and skip some logging steps (but remain the final one)

Thanks.
